document: The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris, France. It was completed in 1889 for the World's Fair. The tower was designed by Gustave Eiffel and stands approximately 300 meters tall.

questions.question: When was the Eiffel Tower completed?

document: Marie Curie was a physicist and chemist who conducted pioneering research on radioactivity. She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize and remains the only person to win Nobel Prizes in two scientific fields.

questions.question: What scientific fields did Marie Curie win Nobel Prizes in?

document: Napoléon Bonaparte est né en Corse en 1769. Il devient empereur des Français en 1804 après plusieurs campagnes militaires.
La tour Eiffel se situe à Paris. Elle a été construite pour l'Exposition universelle de 1889 et mesure environ 300 mètres.

questions.question: Pourquoi la tour Eiffel a-t-elle été construite ?

document: 长城始建于战国时期，用于防御北方游牧民族的入侵。明代对长城进行了大规模修建。

questions.question: 长城最早始建于哪个时期？

document: 北京是中国的首都，也是全国的政治和文化中心。北京曾举办2008年夏季奥运会。

questions.question: 北京在哪一年举办了夏季奥运会？
